name: Pandora’s Box
printed_effect:
This Pandora's Box can only be Cast when an
opponent activates an effect that Searches for
or Casts a card from their deck. Negate that
effect and that opponent must send the top 2
cards from their deck to their Underworld.
effect: This Pandora's Box can only be played when an opponent activates an effect that Searches for or Casts a card from their deck. Negate that effect and that opponent sends the top 2 cards from their deck to their Underworld.
